definition: script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The shooting script was actually based on two scripts (written separately by Welles and Mankiewicz) that Welles combined into one for the final version.
sentences.chinese: 威爾斯最終用的是他和曼凱維支寫的劇本的混編版。

sentences.english: The script refers to this single-man walker as a modified scout walker.
sentences.chinese: 劇本稱這種單人步行機爲改造過的探察步行機。

sentences.english: The budget will depend on the script, what kind of financing the producer can get, and also who is cast in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 預算取決於劇本，獲得的投資以及影片的演員陣容。

sentences.english: Chapter Five analyses the creative features of new scenarios of Shanghai"s Peking Opera."
sentences.chinese: 第五章則是對上海京劇新編劇本創作特點的分析。

sentences.english: I’m looking at scripts and auditioning.
sentences.chinese: 我也盼着其它的好劇本和試演機會。

sentences.english: And there are tons and tons of pieces of script pages and scribbled notes.
sentences.chinese: 還有成噸成噸的劇本及塗寫的筆記。

sentences.english: Screenplays can be categorized as original or adapted.
sentences.chinese: 劇本可以分爲原創和改編兩大類。

sentences.english: She writes stories. And she creates plays that the sisters perform together.
sentences.chinese: 她寫故事，爲四姐妹的同臺表演創作劇本。

sentences.english: Cui yuan for a long time didnt write the script, now began to rewrite call love you of time.
sentences.chinese: 崔元很久沒寫劇本了，現在開始重寫叫愛你的時間。

sentences.english: He's getting barraged with new scripts every month from filmmakers across Asia.
sentences.chinese: 他每月都會接二連三地接到來自亞洲製片人的新劇本。

sentences.english: I guess it's very difficult to write plays.
The play was a dramatization of a short story.
sentences.chinese: 那個劇本是對一個簡短事故的戲劇化。

sentences.english: Churchill began with short stories and moved to playwriting in college.
sentences.chinese: 丘吉爾開始短篇小說和劇本中轉移到學院。

sentences.english: This is good material for a play.
You are your own life of the author, why put the script written suffer unspeakably.
sentences.chinese: 你是你自己人生的作者，何必要把劇本寫得苦不堪言。
